mapper.insert:
select order_seq.nextval from dual
insert into orderinfo (orderId, userId, orderDate, orderStatus, shippingAddress, accountTransfer, creditCard, phone, withoutBankbook, checked ) values(#{orderId}, #{userId}, sysdate, '배송준비중', #{shippingAddress}, #{accountTransfer},#{creditCard},#{phone},#{withoutBankbook},'no')
mapper.select: select orderId from orderinfo where userId = #{userId} and checked ='no'
mapper.update: update orderinfo set checked ='yes' where orderId = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: insert into orderDetail (userId, productId, orderId, quantity) values(#{userId},#{productId},#{orderId},#{quantity})
